projectsList.title: Stream Aggregator
projectsList.description: Spark-based service designed to process and transform streaming data. The system ingests data from Apache Kafka as the input source, performs near-real-time processing, and outputs the results back to Kafka. The entire solution operates within a clustered microservices architecture, ensuring scalability, fault tolerance, and high availability.Additionally, the application is integrated with Prometheus for monitoring and observability. Metrics related to performance, resource utilization, and processing pipelines are exposed, enabling seamless integration with the broader monitoring ecosystem.
